title: DARIUS MAINS REJOICE
body: Death By 1000 Dunks is a new club I've created solely for the purpose of gathering the best dunkers of OCE together to have some fun! If your interested come join, I'm open to all requests with the only catch - your sole purpose in life is being devoted to dunk!

replies.body:
I'm interested in joining!
Except this is my old account so could you add me on Bornstellar? Thanks
May I please join the Club Clan Tag Association? I have been trying to find a Darius Main Tag for ages now. :){{champion:122}} {{item:3053}}
Unfortunately due to the club receiving no attention I had to disband it however I've recently become part of another darius mains club that I'd be happy to invite you to :)
That would be lovely :) I have added you on league :P
All for one Darius ... Heavy Breathing.
No one interested? Come on theres gotta be a lot of darius mains out there!
